Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Wilson
Reviews.Content: I love my new Canon 70D. I purchased it as a replacement for the T2i which I had had for two and a half years and had outgrown. I saw the 70D as the next step in my development as a photographer. I have had it for two months now and realize I don't really need all the lenses and extras that came with the package. I have only used the 50mm lens to train myself to use a lens that has only one focal length.All in all I have made the right decision and I am enjoying learning my new camera as I become a better photographer.

Reviews.Title: Incredible bargain!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a great camera bundle with everything I needed to get started in photography. This is it. The 70D camera body has more features and technology than I'll ever learn to use. The lenses are pretty basic, with overlapping zoom ranges. You'll need to get another lens to cover the under 50 mm range. But all in all, I've had a lot of fun with this bundle and the price can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: Great for low light gymnastics shots!
Reviews.Author: Die Hard Fan
Reviews.Content: Great camera & accessories for my husband.  Excellent for gymnastics shots! Bought this specifically for low light action shots and love it.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money!
Reviews.Author: Jo Ray Tanchiatco
Reviews.Content: Everything is great with the exception of the external flash and the tripod which looked really cheap. therefore everything else is great. the lenses, the camera, the memory card. definitely recommends it to everyone. this is the best deal you could get for 70d!!!!

Reviews.Title: I Liked it
Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: This is my first DSLR camera. The camera is great, its new and I am loving it. The shipping was great, it arrived in 2 days. However, the lenses are not that good. With this amount of money, guys it's a great deal.

Reviews.Title: canon 70D camera
Reviews.Author: Tom "Cooler"
Reviews.Content: Great camera and fast shipping. Easy to use...and great features.  Really nice Canon lenses that came in package.  I also bought the Canon 18 - 135mm STM lense that was a must for this camera....

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: First time I do this kind of purchase on Amazon, I'm from Peru and only the camera is like 1800$ so I had to buy this kit and it went great! The shipping was fast. Everything works perfectly. Of course the carrying case or the tripod or the filters are not the best but they are good to start taking pics, they will help you for the moment )you will have to get them later on your own).. in conclusion I'm very happy I did it! the camera is great! I totally recommend the seller :)
